cbir.retriever

Class Utility

  • java.lang.Object
    • cbir.retriever.Utility

  • public class Utility
extends java.lang.Object
    This utility class implements all shared functions of the distance based and the score based retrievers.
    Author:
    Chris Wendler

    • Method Detail

      • findNearestNeighbors

        public static java.util.List<ImageContainer> findNearestNeighbors(java.util.List<ImageContainer> database,
                                                  int amount,
                                                  java.util.Comparator<ImageContainer> comparator)
        Finds the "amount" nearest neighbors of the given image (defined in the comparator).
        Parameters:
        database - the list of images that represents the database.
        amount - the desired amount of nearest neighbors.
        comparator - the comparator which is used to compare images.
        Returns:
        The list of the nearest neighbors.

      • toLinuxPath

        public static java.lang.String toLinuxPath(java.lang.String windowspath)
        Convertes a path containing windows file separators to a path containing linux file separators.
        Parameters:
        windowspath - the path of a file in a windows operating system.
        Returns:
        the path of the file in a linux operating system.

      • printResultListHTML

        public static void printResultListHTML(java.util.List<ImageContainer> results,
                       DescriptorType type,
                       java.lang.String filename)
        Prints a list of images to a given file in html format.
        Parameters:
        results - the list of images to be printed.
        type - the descriptortype is also printed.
        filename - the filename of the target file.

      • getImageByName

        public static ImageContainer getImageByName(java.util.List<ImageContainer> database,
                            java.lang.String name)
        Queries for an image with a specific name.
        Parameters:
        database - the database in which the lookup is performed.
        name - is the filename of the image.
        Returns:
        The image object with the given filename or null if not found.
